Frenzy Handbook    

   start => doc_en

Configuration center

Frenzy is configured by frconf utility.

When “frconf” starts without parameters, module choosing window appears. Besides the frconf module, there are utilities call modules: netconf and servconf.

frconf swap

This utility is made for creating swap file. When you create swap file, you need to specify filesize in megabytes and a path to the catalogue, where it will be created.

There also is an ability to see the information about swap files and partitions

Before you create a swap-file on harddrive you should check that the partition for the swap file is mounted for writing. You can remount the partition using remount utility.

frconf cons

Allows you to change console font, keyboard layout and screenmap.
